summary: Consume Adalo API for operations like creating, updating, deleting, and retrieving rows in collections.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Select the type of resource to interact with (collection or custom API call).

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Choose the operation to perform (create, update, delete, get, getAll) on the selected resource.

parameters.name: collection id
parameters.description: The ID of the collection in your Adalo application to perform operations on.

parameters.name: row id
parameters.description: The ID of the row in the collection to perform get, update, or delete operations on.

parameters.name: data to send
parameters.description: Choose how to handle input data for create or update operations.

parameters.name: return all
parameters.description: Specify whether to return all results or only up to a given limit for getAll operation.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return for getAll operation.

parameters.name: request options
parameters.description: Additional options for the HTTP request like batching, SSL validation, proxy, and timeout.
